ai_summary: This commit updates several documentation files related to Microsoft Entra ID Governance.  Specifically, it modifies the lifecycle workflow tasks documentation to clarify the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, including details on configurable parameters like delaying removal. Additionally, it updates the PIM documentation to clarify how to assign custom roles with administrative unit scope and updates the image for the workbook risk-based policy impact.

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for lifecycle workflows in Microsoft Entra ID.  Specifically, it describes enhancements to the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, including the ability to customize the task's behavior, description, and delay the removal of access package assignments. The commit also updates a related image.

author: rolyon
message: Assign custom role with administrative unit scope
ai_summary: This commit modifies the "pim-how-to-add-role-to-user.md" document related to Privileged Identity Management. The changes include updating the date and clarifying instructions on assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope using the Microsoft Graph API and administrative units. The updated document points users to the correct method for assigning custom roles within administrative units and provides additional guidance on creating administrative units.

Assignment package workflow Public Preview
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for Lifecycle Workflow tasks, specifically focusing on the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The changes include updating the description to reflect new customization options, adding information about the "daysUntilExpiration" parameter, and providing a code example demonstrating the task's arguments. Additionally, an image file related to the task documentation was also modified.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit modifies the `docs/id-governance/lifecycle-workflow-tasks.md` file. It adds a single line to the documentation, specifying the "arguments" parameter for the "Remove all access package assignments" task definition. This argument includes a "daysUntilExpiration" parameter, used to set the number of days until the expiration of the access package assignments for the user.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for Lifecycle Workflows tasks in Microsoft Entra. Specifically, it modifies the documentation for the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task to reflect new functionality, allowing administrators to specify whether access package assignments are removed immediately or after a delay. Additionally, an image related to the task is also updated.
